text: Josh Thomson (born 1981 in Timaru, New Zealand) is a New Zealand actor and comedian of Tongan heritage. He is best known for his work as a comedian on 7 Days, as a panelist on The Project and as Pigsy, in the Netflix series The New Legends of Monkey. He has frequently collaborated with production house thedownlowconcept starring as the lead in their movie Gary of the Pacific. He starred in and directed his own father in the award winning web series Subject:Dad. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Timaru Category:21st-century New Zealand male actors Category:New Zealand people of Tongan descent Category:New Zealand male comedians
title: Josh Thomson (actor)
